101.title: Infinite string
101.preamble: I reached the end of this line without seeing an appropriate close quote:
101.message: Strings should be surrounded with double quotes like "this". Please add a closing double quote in your code.

102.title: Use double quotes
102.preamble: The following string uses single quotes when it should use double quotes:
102.message: In Arizona, double quotes are used for strings like "foobar", whereas it uses single quotes for individual characters like 'a' or 'èŠ±'.
